About

I'm a software engineer and security researcher with a focus on lab architecture, virtualization, and technical documentation. I build segmented environments for safe experimentation and document the process for repeatability.

My work spans dual-boot lab setups, network segmentation, packet analysis, and log collection. I believe in OS-level separation for lab containment and clear documentation for knowledge sharing.

Skills

  • Dual-boot architecture planning
  • Virtualization management (VirtualBox)
  • Network segmentation and static IP planning
  • Packet analysis (Wireshark)
  • Log collection and parsing
  • Structured technical documentation

Interests

Security lab design, automation, detection development, and writing clear technical guides.
